mapper.select: SELECT D.DONATION_NO, D.TARGET_AMOUNT, D.LOCATION_X, D.LOCATION_Y, D.DONATION_ADDR, D.ENROLL_DATE, TO_CHAR(D.START_RECRUIT_DATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD') AS START_RECRUIT_DATE, TO_CHAR(D.END_RECRUIT_DATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD') AS END_RECRUIT_DATE, TO_CHAR(D.START_PROGRESS_DATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD') AS START_PROGRESS_DATE, TO_CHAR(D.END_PROGRESS_DATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD') AS END_PROGRESS_DATE, D.DELETE_STATUS, D.DCOM_STATUS, D.DONATION_AMOUNT, D.VIEW_COUNT, D.DONATION_TITLE, D.DONATION_CONTENT, D.DONATION_ATTACHMENT, D.MEMBER_NO, D.PARENT_CATEGORY_NO, D.AGENCY_NO, C.PARENT_CATEGORY_NAME, COUNT(F.FAVORITE_NO) AS FAVORITE_COUNT FROM DONATION D JOIN PARENT_CATEGORY C ON D.PARENT_CATEGORY_NO = C.PARENT_CATEGORY_NO LEFT JOIN FAVORITES F ON D.DONATION_NO = F.DONATION_NO GROUP BY D.DONATION_NO, D.TARGET_AMOUNT, D.LOCATION_X, D.LOCATION_Y, D.DONATION_ADDR, D.ENROLL_DATE, D.START_RECRUIT_DATE, D.END_RECRUIT_DATE, D.START_PROGRESS_DATE, D.END_PROGRESS_DATE, D.DELETE_STATUS, D.DCOM_STATUS, D.DONATION_AMOUNT, D.VIEW_COUNT, D.DONATION_TITLE, D.DONATION_CONTENT, D.DONATION_ATTACHMENT, D.MEMBER_NO, D.PARENT_CATEGORY_NO, D.AGENCY_NO, C.PARENT_CATEGORY_NAME ORDER BY FAVORITE_COUNT DESC
